title: Simplified Upgrade Procedure when Upgrading from 8.3 - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: This section describes the Simplified Upgrade Procedure from Mediationzone Version 8.3 to 9.4. See to Upgrade Overview for information on Simplified Upgrade Procedure. Ensure to read through all the documentation for the Simplified Upgrade Procedure and check out the Release Notes for Important information and Known Issues before proceeding with the Upgrade. Ensure that you follow the instructions in the order outlined in this section. Note! Before starting the upgrade, please make sure you check your 8-release configuration and CI/CD scripts to make sure they are compatible with the 9-release. Follow instructions in section Preparations for Upgrading from 8.3 to 9.x . This section has the following subsections: Pre-Upgrade: Preparation for 9 when Upgrading from 8.3 Install New Platform and Execution Container when Upgrading from 8.3 Parameter Migration Preparation when Upgrading from 8.3 CHOOI SAN: 8.3 Post Simplified Upgrade Steps
